questions.barriers: Select the barriers to improving the SHF on your organization
questions.contextual_characteristics: Select the contextual characteristics of your organization
questions.copy_mechanisms: Select the coping mechanisms that you find useful on your organization
questions.correlate_barriers_with_shf: For each factor you selected, indicate which of the barriers influence that factor
questions.correlate_barriers_with_strategies: For each barrier you selected, indicate which of the improvement strategies influence that factor
questions.correlate_coping_mechanisms_with_barrier: For each coping mechanisms you selected, indicate which of the barriers influence that mechanism
questions.shf: Select the social and human factors that affects your organization
questions.strategies: Select the Improvement Strategies that you find useful on your organization
